name: GlowTouch Technologies
tagline: Global Customer Support | Tech Support Services
description:
GlowTouch Technologies is a global customer care right sourcing organization that puts people first. Whether you are ready to effectively scale your care operations or seamlessly integrate customer success across your channels, platforms, and devices, you can depend on GlowTouch to support your needs. 
GlowTouch is a woman-led organization, and is headquartered in Louisville, KY, with US offices in Chicago, IL, Dallas, TX, and India offices and delivery centers in Mangalore and Bangalore. We invest in our people, so they can bring your company long-term growth. Y(our) success enables us to give more back to the community – and that’s good for us all. Find us online at www.glowtouch.com.
